answers.answer: Hi,How are you? Passing out or losing consciousness are often associated with alcoholic drinks and not necessarily from a soda. This may be due to a variety of factors such as the situation or the medical history of the patients like presence of diabetes. Vasovagal syncope, one of the most common types, may occur in situations such as  blood drawing, coughing, urination or defecation.  This can also happen when there is a  change in body posture, from heart-related conditions or from neurological conditions, low blood-sugar levels and lung disease such as emphysema and a pulmonary embolus. If it recurs, it is best that you have this checked by your doctor for proper evaluation. Direct clinical examination and diagnostic tests may be indicated.  Take care and do keep us posted.

question: Can drinking dr pepper too fast cause you to pass out?
title: Dr Pepper
